title: The Blind Man's Elephant: a product vision towards private identities
description:
A short talk introducing the concepts of key properties we want to achieve in private ZK identities. Sparkling concepts like SSI and DIDs and why blockchains are the best way to ensure that.

Finally it concludes with simple ZK and data-structure constructions and different alternatives that are seeking to provide this characteristics.

In short, this is a lightning overview of the space, it's desired features and different approaches to achieve them.
